original_text: But Solomon did not make any of the Israelites do the hard work. Instead, they served him as his soldiers, government officers and army officers. Some of the soldiers drove chariots and some were leaders of the chariot drivers.
korean_text: 다만 이스라엘 자손은 솔로몬이 노예를 삼지 아니하였으니 그들은 군사와 그 신하와 고관과 대장이며 병거와 마병의 지휘관이 됨이었더라

sentences.original_text: But Solomon did not make any of the Israelites do the hard work.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 솔로몬은 이스라엘 사람들에게 어려운 일을 시키지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, they served him as his soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 그들은 그의 군사로서 그를 섬겼습니다

sentences.original_text: Some of the soldiers drove chariots
and some were leaders of the chariot drivers.
